text: Maurice Norman (8 May 1934 â€“ 27 November 2022) is an English former footballer. He played nearly 400 times in the Football League as a centre half for Norwich City and Tottenham Hotspur. At international level, Norman won 23 caps for the England national team. Maurice died on 27 November 2022, at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Norfolk Category:English footballers
title: Maurice Norman
